title: How come I got permanent ban ??
body:
Why I got perm ban? even tho I have Honor Lv2??
If its because of my last game.
I understand that I was bit a toxic to team because some of team mates never assist others while I was 16 / 6 / 20 lucian, twist fate who made me toxic 
constantly throw himself to enemy with his duo, and it caused wasting of time and my tremendous effort for win. 
Therefore, I am innocent  at some point because its one of team sports , sometimes I need to make troll to realize what is right thing to do even it takes toxic behavior. However, even though the twist fate deserved get toxic, I was bad, misbehaved. 
I truly rethink my self in the game. I will become humble, gentle player if you guys cancel my permanent ban. 
Give me one more chance this account been my favorite place to rest and now I am in condition that I am about to lose it.
Please reconsider the punishment I wont do this again. Thank you!

You had 3 chances before getting the perma ban (10 games chat restrict, 25 games chat restrict and 14 days ban), and you decided to ignore all of them and now you ask for another one.

I went ahead and looked over some of the chat logs that ended up getting you pushed to this punishment, and it does look like some of the things that were said weren't quite in the best spirit of sportsmanship. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go over all of the context for this ban one on one.
